bibl.title: A New Papyrus of Pindar's Paeans: Notes on P. Oxy. LVI 3822 (= Pa. VIII, VIII b).
bibl.note: A. P. Oxy. LVI, 3822, fr. 5 and the structure of Paean VIII. - B. A Title. Fr. 1, line 5. - C. A closing paean-cry. Fr. 1, line 4.
